title: How to Draw Taz from Looney Tunes

steps.title: Create a succession of shapes such as a circle first, then a heart and third an oval; this will form his head.
steps.content: Create a succession of shapes such as a circle first, then a heart and third an oval; this will form his head. Draw also vertical and horizontal lines to serve as your guidelines for his head.

steps.title: Add his mane of hair and ears.
steps.content: Add his mane of hair and ears. His fur is usually pointy and scattered on the top of his head and cheeks.

steps.title: Add now a vertical guideline to start sketching his body.
steps.content: Add now a vertical guideline to start sketching his body. Sketch his body by drawing a series of triangular shapes from his main body all the way to his feet.

steps.title: Then draw his arms and hands.
steps.content: Then draw his arms and hands. Draw distorted triangles for his arms and then draw his hands. His hands usually have four fingers, but for this particular picture make his finger cross each other as if they are huddled together.

steps.title: Connect your drawn shapes and clean up some inside lines to prepare your artwork for Taz’s details.
steps.content: Connect your drawn shapes and clean up some inside lines to prepare your artwork for Taz’s details.

steps.title: Now begin drawing Taz’s face.
steps.content: Now begin drawing Taz’s face. Draw his eyes, lines for some of his hair, round nose and triangular shapes for his sharp teeth. Try drawing the outside of his eyes by drawing two triangles stuck together or imagining a “figure of 8” form and then drawing two small ovals inside it.

steps.title: Finally, draw details on his body.
steps.content: Finally, draw details on his body. Draw lines for his toes and fingers, a “U” shape form for his stomach and then add more hair or fur on his arms. Don’t forget to add his tail for the final touches on your drawing.

steps.title: You can now outline your artwork.
steps.content: You can now outline your artwork. Erase inside lines and guidelines and outline by sketching thick lines or by using a black pen or marker.

steps.title: Color your drawing.
steps.content: Color your drawing. Use colors such as brown, a bit of pink and some flesh tones and then you’re done.
